author: lofwyr
msg: demo: rename directories, so that they contain the title and not only the number, for more pleasant working with IDEs

author: jukka
msg: JCR-3223: Disallow unregistering of node types still (possibly) in use
Add a feature flag to restore the unfortunate functionality in Jackrabbit 2.1 and 2.2 for those users who've already started to rely on this functionality
